data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Invoice Header'
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define view entity ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_INVH
  as projection on ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVH
{
  key FileExportNumber,
  key BillingDocument,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
      CompanyCode,
      CompanyCodeName,
      BillingDocumentType,
      BillingDocumentTypeName,
      SalesOrganization,
      SalesOrganizationName,
      DistributionChannel,
      DistributionChannelName,
      Division,
      DivisionName,
      PayerParty,
      PayerPartyName,
      SoldToParty,
      SoldToPartyName,
      TotalNetAmount,
      TotalTaxAmount,
      TransactionCurrency,
      BillingDocumentDate,
      DocumentReferenceID,
      CustomerPaymentTerms,
      CustomerPaymentTermsName,
      IncotermsClassification,
      IncotermsTransferLocation,
      IncotermsVersion,
      CreationDate,
      CreationTime,
      CreatedByUser,
      AccountingTransferStatus,
      AccountingTransferStatusText,
      _ExportFile : redirected to parent ZETR_DDL_C_EXP_HEADER
}
